course_description: Prerequisites: Persian 202 or permission of instructor. Readings of selected literary texts and newspapers/media with attention to expansion of vocabulary, further development of listening, writing, and speaking skills, reading strategies, and cultural competence.
sections: Class Nbr: 1914, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: H. Samei, Status: Open
